instructions.original_text: Defrost the puff pastry according to package directions.

output_quality: Puff pastry should be defrosted according to package directions.

instructions.original_text: Dice apples into small pieces and place apples in a pot over medium heat.

task.action_name: Dice apples and place in pot over medium heat
output_quality: Apples should be diced into small pieces and placed in pot over medium heat.

instructions.original_text: To the pot add butter, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, allspice, vanilla extract, lemon juice, and salt.

output_quality: Butter, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, allspice, vanilla extract, lemon juice, and salt should be added to the pot.

instructions.original_text: Cook apples for about 10 to 12 minutes or until the apples are softened.

output_quality: Apples should be softened after cooking for 10 to 12 minutes.

instructions.original_text: Cut puff pastry into 8 squares.

output_quality: Puff pastry should be cut into 8 squares.

failure: Puff pastry not cut into 8 squares

instructions.original_text: Spoon 1 heaping tablespoon of cooked apples onto one side of each one of the squares.

output_quality: 1 heaping tablespoon of cooked apples should be on one side of each square.

failure: Apples not placed on one side

instructions.original_text: Brush water on the edge of each one of the squares and fold the squares over on each other. Use a fork to crimp the edges together.

task.action_name: Brush water on edges and fold squares
output_quality: Water should be brushed on the edges of each square.
Squares should be folded over and edges crimped with a fork.

instructions.original_text: Add enough oil to a large pot or deep fryer to cover the bottom 3 inches.

output_quality: Oil should cover the bottom 3 inches of the pot or deep fryer.

instructions.original_text: Heat oil until 350 degrees. The oil will be ready when you drop a small piece of dough in the oil and it cooks rapidly.

output_quality: Oil should be heated to 350 degrees.

instructions.original_text: Cook pies 2 at a time, for about 1 minute on each side.

output_quality: Pies should be cooked for about 1 minute on each side.

instructions.original_text: Remove pies when both sides are golden brown.

output_quality: Both sides of the pies should be golden brown.

instructions.original_text: Place fried pies on a wire rack to drain excess oil.

output_quality: Excess oil should be drained from the pies.

instructions.original_text: If you want to keep the pies warm, hold them in a 200-degree oven until you are ready to serve.

output_quality: Pies should be kept warm in a 200-degree oven.

instructions.original_text: Toast the buns in a cast-iron or stainless-steel skillet over medium heat for about 1 minute, or until they brown. Set aside.

output_quality: Buns should be browned and toasted.

instructions.original_text: Form the ground beef into 4 equal balls. Place each ball of meat between two sheets of waxed paper or plastic wrap and gently press the meat into disc shapes. Do not press too hard, as the patties may fall apart.

output_quality: Ground beef should be shaped into disc-shaped patties.

instructions.original_text: In the same skillet you used to toast the buns, cook the patties for 3 to 4 minutes on each side. Season each side with salt while cooking.

output_quality: Patties should be cooked for 3 to 4 minutes on each side and seasoned with salt.

instructions.original_text: Place the bottom buns on a plate. To each bun add: a slice of American cheese, 1 burger patty, another slice of American cheese, 2 pickle slices, several sliced white onions, 1 teaspoon of mustard, and 2 to 3 teaspoons of ketchup. Cover the burger with the top bun.

output_quality: Each bun should have the specified toppings and be covered with the top bun.

instructions.original_text: Toast the buns in a cast-iron or stainless-steel skillet over medium heat for about 1 minute, or until they brown. Set aside.

output_quality: Buns should be browned and toasted.

instructions.original_text: To make the smoky sauce, combine the mayonnaise, liquid smoke, and paprika in a small bowl. Mix well and set aside.

task.action_name: Combine mayonnaise, liquid smoke, and paprika in a small bowl
output_quality: Ingredients should be well mixed.

instructions.original_text: Form the meat into 4 equal balls. Place each ball between two sheets of waxed paper or plastic wrap and gently press the meat into patties. Do not press too hard, as the patties may fall apart.

task.action_name: Form the meat into 4 equal balls
output_quality: Meat is divided into 4 equal balls.

task.action_name: Place each ball between two sheets of waxed paper or plastic wrap and gently press the meat into patties
output_quality: Meat is formed into patties.

failure: Patties are too thin or fall apart

instructions.original_text: Cook the patties for 3 to 4 minutes per side in the same skillet where you toasted the buns. Season the patties with salt before and after flipping them over in the skillet.

output_quality: Patties should be cooked for 3 to 4 minutes per side.
Patties should be seasoned with salt before and after flipping.

instructions.original_text: To build the burger, place a bottom bun on a plate. Spread some smoky sauce on the bun. Top with 1 slice of American cheese, followed by 1 burger patty and another slice of American cheese. Cut 2 slices of bacon in half and place the resulting 4 pieces of bacon on top of the cheese. Add 3 or 4 tomato slices and some shredded lettuce. Spread smoky sauce on the top bun and place it on the burger.

output_quality: Burger should be assembled with all ingredients in the specified order.

instructions.original_text: Boil 1 quart of water. When the water reaches a boil, add the teabags and sugar and stir until the sugar dissolves.

task.action_name: Boil water and prepare tea mixture
output_quality: Water should be boiled.
Teabags and sugar should be added to the boiling water and stirred until the sugar dissolves.

instructions.original_text: Reduce the temperature to a simmer and let the tea steep for 5 minutes. Remove and discard the teabags.

output_quality: Tea should steep for 5 minutes at a simmering temperature.
Teabags should be removed and discarded.

failure: Tea not steeped for the correct duration

instructions.original_text: Fill a pitcher with ice. Pour the tea over the ice and add the rest of the water to fill the pitcher.

output_quality: Pitcher should be filled with ice.
Tea should be poured over the ice, and the rest of the water added to fill the pitcher.

instructions.original_text: Store the tea in the refrigerator.

output_quality: Tea should be stored in the refrigerator.

ingredients.name: Hidden Valley Original Ranch Seasoning and Salad Dressing Mix

quantity.details: plus extra to season the chicken
plus extra to season to chicken

instructions.original_text: To make the dressing, combine the buttermilk, mayonnaise, and Hidden Valley Original Ranch Seasoning and Salad Dressing Mix in a small bowl. Mix well and place in the refrigerator.

output_quality: Buttermilk, mayonnaise, and ranch seasoning mix should be combined in a small bowl.
Mixture should be well-mixed.
Place the mixture in the refrigerator.

instructions.original_text: Cut the chicken breasts in half horizontally to create thinner cutlets. Season with a bit of salt and pepper.

output_quality: Chicken breasts should be cut in half horizontally to create thinner cutlets.
Cutlets should be seasoned with salt and pepper.

instructions.original_text: Set up a breading station: Combine the all-purpose flour, cornmeal, onion powder, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and ground black pepper in a flat dish. Stir until well combined. In another shallow dish, combine the egg and milk and beat until smooth.

output_quality: Combine flour, cornmeal, onion powder, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper in a flat dish.
Stir until well combined.
Combine eggs and milk in another shallow dish and beat until smooth.

instructions.original_text: Pour the vegetable oil into a deep, heavy-bottomed pot until it reaches a depth of 4 inches. Bring the oil to 350Â°F over medium-high heat.

output_quality: Vegetable oil should be poured into a deep, heavy-bottomed pot until it reaches a depth of 4 inches.
Oil should be heated to 350Â°F over medium-high heat.

instructions.original_text: While the oil is heating, bread the chicken: Place the chicken into the flour, covering both sides, and shake off the excess. Dip the chicken into the egg mixture and shake off the excess. Then dip the chicken into the flour mixture again. Place the breaded chicken on a wire rack to rest for about 5 minutes before frying. This will help the coating adhere to the chicken.

output_quality: Chicken should be coated in flour, covering both sides, and excess flour should be shaken off.
Chicken should be dipped into the egg mixture and excess egg mixture should be shaken off.
Chicken should be dipped into the flour mixture again.
Breaded chicken should be placed on a wire rack to rest for about 5 minutes before frying.

instructions.original_text: Fry the chicken breasts, 2 at a time, for 7 to 8 minutes, or until the chicken has browned and reaches an internal temperature of 165Â°F. Drain the chicken on a clean wire rack.

output_quality: Chicken breasts should be fried 2 at a time for 7 to 8 minutes, or until browned and reaches an internal temperature of 165Â°F.
Drain the fried chicken on a clean wire rack.

instructions.original_text: Slice the potato buns if necessary and brush the cut sides with melted butter. Toast in a skillet over medium-high heat for 1 to 2 minutes, or until the buns are golden brown.

output_quality: Buns should be brushed with melted butter on the cut sides.
Toast the buns in a skillet over medium-high heat for 1 to 2 minutes, or until golden brown.

instructions.original_text: To assemble the sandwiches, spread a generous amount of ranch dressing on the bottom bun and top with a fried chicken cutlet. Add 3 bacon slices followed by 3 pickles. Spread a generous amount of ranch dressing on the top bun and place it on the sandwich.

output_quality: Bottom bun should be spread with ranch dressing.
Top with a fried chicken cutlet.
Add 3 bacon slices followed by 3 pickles.
Spread ranch dressing on the top bun and place it on the sandwich.

instructions.original_text: To make the deluxe version, assemble the sandwich as described above, with the addition of 2 tablespoons of shredded lettuce and 3 tomato slices in between the bacon and pickles.

output_quality: Add 2 tablespoons of shredded lettuce and 3 tomato slices between the bacon and pickles.

allergies.details: plus 5 extra bottom buns for use as middle buns

instructions.original_text: In a bowl, season the ground chuck with salt and pepper. Shape the meat into 10 relatively thin patties.

output_quality: Season ground chuck with salt and pepper in a bowl.
Shape the meat into 10 relatively thin patties.

instructions.original_text: Heat a griddle to 350Â°F. Place the patties on the griddle and cook for 3 to 4 minutes on one side, adding an extra dash of salt and pepper while cooking. Flip the burgers and cook for an additional 3 to 4 minutes, until the juices from the meat run clear.

output_quality: Cook patties on a preheated griddle at 350Â°F.
Cook for 3 to 4 minutes on one side, adding salt and pepper while cooking.
Flip the burgers and cook for an additional 3 to 4 minutes.

instructions.original_text: Flip the burgers and cook for an additional 3 to 4 minutes, until the juices from the meat run clear.

output_quality: Flip the burgers and cook for an additional 3 to 4 minutes, until the juices from the meat run clear.

instructions.original_text: Spread the softened butter on the cut sides of the buns and place them on the griddle until the bread begins to brown. Flip the middle buns and allow them to toast on both sides.

task.action_name: Toast the buns on the griddle
output_quality: Spread softened butter on the cut sides of the buns.
Place the buns on the griddle until the bread begins to brown.
Flip the middle buns and toast on both sides.

instructions.original_text: Assemble the burgers in the following order: bottom bun, Big Mac sauce, onions, lettuce, cheese, hamburger patty, middle bun, Big Mac sauce, onions, lettuce, hamburger patty, two or three pickle slices, and finally the top bun.

output_quality: Assemble the burgers in the specified order.

instructions.original_text: Crumble and fry pork sausage, stir and separate meat so it will fry in small little pieces. Remove from heat drain excess grease.

output_quality: Crumble and fry pork sausage, stirring and separating meat to fry in small pieces.
Remove from heat and drain excess grease.

instructions.original_text: Place drained sausage in frying pan add onion, green chilies, and tomatoes, heat on medium temperature just until sausage and vegetables are heated through, stir frequently.

output_quality: Place drained sausage in frying pan.
Add onion, green chilies, and tomatoes.
Heat on medium temperature until sausage and vegetables are heated through, stirring frequently.

instructions.original_text: Measure 2 cups of eggs and beat. Add the eggs to the pan with the sausage mixture. When cooked remove from heat.

output_quality: Measure and beat 2 cups of eggs.
Add eggs to the pan with the sausage mixture.
Cook until eggs are done and remove from heat.

instructions.original_text: Place two tablespoons of the sausage and egg mixture onto 1 tortilla, tear each slice of American cheese into two even portions, then place the cheese on top of the sausage mixture, and roll the tortilla.

output_quality: Place two tablespoons of the sausage and egg mixture onto 1 tortilla.
Tear each slice of American cheese into two even portions, then place the cheese on top of the sausage mixture.
Roll the tortilla.

failure: Uneven distribution of sausage and egg mixture

instructions.original_text: If you make these all ahead of time, you can wrap in plastic to store them in the refrigerator or freezer, and then heat them up in the microwave for a moment or two.

output_quality: Wrap the burritos in plastic.
Store them in the refrigerator or freezer.

instructions.original_text: Serve with your favorite taco or Picante sauce. You will find these are milder and really great for breakfast. I also like to serve sour cream and avocado with mine.

output_quality: Serve burritos with taco or Picante sauce.
Optionally, serve with sour cream and avocado.

quantity.details: strong, or two shots of espresso

allergies.details: the lower the fat content the better, it will froth more

instructions.original_text: Warm the milk in a small pan or in the microwave.

output_quality: Heat the milk in a small pan or microwave until warm.

instructions.original_text: Froth the milk with a frother or by putting it in a sealed jar and shaking it vigorously.

output_quality: Use a frother or sealed jar to froth the warmed milk.

instructions.original_text: Pour the hot coffee or espresso into a large warm coffee mug.

output_quality: Pour hot coffee or espresso into a large warm coffee mug.

instructions.original_text: Add 1 tablespoon of caramel syrup.

output_quality: Pour 1 tablespoon of caramel syrup into the coffee or espresso.

instructions.original_text: Add warmed milk and stir to combine.

instructions.original_text: Place the oatmeal in a microwave-safe bowl.

output_quality: Place the oatmeal in a microwave-safe bowl.

instructions.original_text: Sprinkle the brown sugar, raisins, white raisins, Craisins, and chopped apples on top.

instructions.original_text: Split open English Muffins and place them into a toaster, toast the English Muffins.

output_quality: Split open English Muffins and toast them in a toaster.

instructions.original_text: In a non-stick skillet over medium heat, cook Candian bacon on both sides for about 1 to 2 minutes in two teaspoons of butter. The bacon should begin to just brown.

output_quality: In a non-stick skillet over medium heat, cook Candian bacon on both sides for about 1 to 2 minutes in two teaspoons of butter. The bacon should begin to just brown.

task.action_name: Spread softened butter on toasted English Muffins
output_quality: Remove the English muffins from the toaster and spread softened butter on both halves.

instructions.original_text: Place the 1 slice of Canadian bacon on each English Muffin bottom.

task.action_name: Assemble English Muffins with Canadian bacon
output_quality: Place one slice of Canadian bacon on each English Muffin bottom.

instructions.original_text: Add about 1 tablespoon of butter to the same skillet where you cooked the bacon.

output_quality: Add about 1 tablespoon of butter to the skillet.

instructions.original_text: Place the quart-sized canning lids screw size up (or you can use an egg ring) into the skillet.
